value.title: Don’t Let These Privacy Shifts Blindside You In 2026
value.content:
Last year, Google decided not to deprecate third-party cookies in Chrome after all. This year, Google decided to jettison its backup plan and not even launch a planned choice prompt for cookies in its browser. By October, the Privacy Sandbox was all but kaput. The UK’s Competition and Markets Authority released Google from its Privacy […]
The post Don’t Let These Privacy Shifts Blindside You In 2026 appeared first on AdExchanger.

value.content:

value.title: Media In 2026: From Managed Decline To Ruthless Independence
value.content:
The era of “managed decline” is over; the era of existential clarity has begun. We are no longer guessing what the post-platform world looks like. We are living in it. Over the last 12 months, the media industry has watched referral traffic flatline and AI crawlers strip-mine our archives without so much as a thank-you […]

value.title: Comic: This Is Our Year
value.content:

value.content:
